item.title: Cargo
item.description: Cargo is a package manager for Rust. It comes with most Rust installations. It manages downloading packages and dependecies, compiles your packages and can be used to upload it to package registries. Basics To create a new package and create the related directory use: cargo new directory_name To build your binary inside your package’s /target/debug/<package_name> directory run: cargo build If you want to build your binary with optimizations for release run:
